about_the_game:
[NEW] Closers Free Package
We present you upgraded gifts for all Steam Agents!
[NEW] Closers Free Package is up for grabs for all Closers Steam players.

Details:
1. Pink Suit Full Set Box X1
• Fancy costume for everyone!

2. Elite Status (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of the premium buff!

3. Gardening Voucher (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of farm planting support!

4. Maid Service Voucher (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of My Room exploration support!

5. Greater Phase Fiber X50
• Essential material for upgrading your costumes!

6. Pet Core X50
• Essential material for enhancing your pets!

Notes:
• DLC contents will be delivered to your in-game delivery box.
• DLC packs can only be received once per account. Once you purchased it, you won't be able to receive the same pack again as a gift.
• All DLC packs will be updated every after a new character release. After the update, new characters may able to use its components.
• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!
detailed_description:
[NEW] Closers Free Package
We present you upgraded gifts for all Steam Agents!
[NEW] Closers Free Package is up for grabs for all Closers Steam players.

Details:
1. Pink Suit Full Set Box X1
• Fancy costume for everyone!

2. Elite Status (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of the premium buff!

3. Gardening Voucher (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of farm planting support!

4. Maid Service Voucher (7-Day) X1
• Get 7 days of My Room exploration support!

5. Greater Phase Fiber X50
• Essential material for upgrading your costumes!

6. Pet Core X50
• Essential material for enhancing your pets!

Notes:
• DLC contents will be delivered to your in-game delivery box.
• DLC packs can only be received once per account. Once you purchased it, you won't be able to receive the same pack again as a gift.
• All DLC packs will be updated every after a new character release. After the update, new characters may able to use its components.
• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

name: [NEW] Closers Free Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050Ti or better graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
